articles.title: Death toll tops 160 following devastating flooding in western Europe - CBC.ca
articles.description: Rescue workers laboured to deal with damage laid bare by receding water on Saturday as the death toll from disastrous flooding in western Europe rose above 160 and thoughts turned to the lengthy job of rebuilding devastated communities.
